user.title: Connect to HomeChat
user.description: Enter your HomeChat server details to connect Home Assistant to your chat server.

data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of your HomeChat server
data_description.port: The port HomeChat is running on
data_description.ssl: Enable if HomeChat is served over HTTPS
data_description.api_token: API token for authentication (create in HomeChat admin panel)

zeroconf_confirm.title: HomeChat Server Discovered

data_description.api_token: API token for authentication (create in HomeChat admin panel)

bot.title: Bot Configuration
bot.description: Configure how Home Assistant appears in HomeChat and enable two-way communication.

data_description.bot_username: The username for the Home Assistant bot in HomeChat
data_description.enable_webhook: Allow HomeChat to send messages back to Home Assistant

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure HomeChat
reconfigure.description: Update your HomeChat server connection details.

data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of your HomeChat server
data_description.port: The port HomeChat is running on

error.invalid_auth: Invalid API token. Please check your credentials in the HomeChat admin panel.

abort.already_configured: This HomeChat instance is already configured in Home Assistant.
